LanguageData.ARA_Base_Technology.label: Basic gene sequence acquisition
LanguageData.ARA_Base_Technology.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Unlock the basic technology of the swarm, allowing the hatching of basic auxiliary insects and armed organs. All technologies in the Arachne swarm that require blueprints can only be researched through genetic test eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1WMT.label: Node WMT-1 "Breakthrough"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1WMT.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows queen species and craft species to evolve to the next stage. All technologies in the Arachne swarm that require blueprints can only be researched through genetic test eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2WMT.label: Node WMT-2 "Breakthrough 2"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2WMT.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows queen species and craft species to evolve to the next stage. All technologies in the Arachne swarm that require blueprints can only be researched through genetic test eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6VXI.label: Node VXI-6 "Acid Sac"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6VXI.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows Zerg with acid sacs to spray strong acid to repel enemies.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7VXI.label: Node VXI-7 "External Acid Bag"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7VXI.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows crafting species to hatch new weapons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8VXI.label: Node VXI-8 "Giant Acid Gland"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8VXI.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows crafting species to hatch new weapons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9VXI.label: Node VXI-9 "Acid Rain"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9VXI.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows crafting species to hatch new weapons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_10VXI.label: Node VXI-10 "Micro Catastrophe"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_10VXI.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows crafting species to hatch new weapons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_11VXI.label: Node VXI-11 "Act of God"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_11VXI.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the construction of the Scourge Acid Burning Cannon Organization, a powerful defense facility that can not only deal with swarms of invading enemies, but can also launch strikes across the map.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1THD.label: Node THD-1 "Psychic Lightning"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1THD.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows crafting species to hatch new psychic lightning weapons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2HAG.label: Node HAG-2 "Incubation Pool"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2HAG.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the Arachne Zerg to build a series of hatchery-related structures to start hatching new Zerg.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1KYC.label: Node KYC-1 "Warrior Bug"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1KYC.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the queen species to hatch new zerg species - warrior species. All technologies in the Arachne swarm that require blueprints can only be researched through genetic test eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4KYC.label: Node KYC-4 "Protozoa"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4KYC.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the Queen species to hatch a new zerg species - the protozoa species, a special type of worm that can parasitize other races to control them. All technologies in the Arachne swarm that require blueprints can only be researched through genetic test eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2KYC.label: Node KYC-2 "Flying Wing Membrane"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2KYC.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the Queen Seed to hatch a new Zerg race - the Sky Seed, an agile and deadly elite Zerg race that has the ability to shuttle through the battlefield in a flying posture. All technologies in the Arachne swarm that require blueprints can only be researched through genetic test eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5KYC.label: Node KYC-5 "Jujia"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5KYC.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the Queen Seed to hatch a new zerg species - the Mist Seed, a large Overlord Bug with a thick carapace that can emit smoke, fire retardants and pheromones that summon zerg reinforcements to assist the swarm in swarming attacks. All technologies in the Arachne swarm that require blueprints can only be researched through genetic test eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6KYC.label: Node KYC-6 "Ling Nao"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6KYC.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the Queen species to hatch a new Zerg species - the Weaver species, a special Zerg species with long lifespan and powerful psychic abilities. It can not only assist the scientific research work of the Zerg swarm, but is also a powerful spellcaster. All technologies in the Arachne swarm that require blueprints can only be researched through genetic test eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7KYC.label: Node KYC-7 "Guard"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7KYC.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the Queen species to hatch a new Zerg species - the Guard species, an elite Zerg species with a longer lifespan than other Zerg species. It has excellent long-range combat capabilities and social skills, and can also serve as a commander to command the Zerg swarm. All technologies in the Arachne swarm that require blueprints can only be researched through genetic test eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6MEN.label: Node MEN-6 "quasi-line"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6MEN.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the Queen species to hatch a new zerg species - the Pseudomonas, a zerg whose body has been parasitized by the Arachne Pseudomonas at birth. Cannon fodder is cheap and can be obtained quickly, but there is no discipline. All technologies in the Arachne swarm that require blueprints can only be researched through genetic test eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4DIL.label: Node DIL-4 "Primary Fabric"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4DIL.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows crafting to hatch new fabrics in fabric cocoons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5DIL.label: Node DIL-5 "Intermediate Fabric"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5DIL.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows crafting to hatch new fabrics in fabric cocoons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6DIL.label: Node DIL-6 "Advanced Fabric"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6DIL.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows crafting to hatch new fabrics in fabric cocoons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5PAV.label: Node PAV-5 "Stinger"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5PAV.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allow craft species to hatch new weapons, and allow some Zerg with poison needles to spray poison needles.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6PAV.label: Node PAV-6 "Heavy Rain"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6PAV.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows crafting species to hatch new weapons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7PAV.label: Node PAV-7 "Bloodthorn"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7PAV.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows crafting species to hatch new weapons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7XPAV.label: Node PAV-7X "Sparedar"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7XPAV.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows crafting species to hatch new weapons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8PAV.label: Node PAV-8 "Gigabit Cannon"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8PAV.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the Zerg to build a powerful defense facility with strong armor-piercing capabilities and a high rate of fire, specializing in fighting heavily armored targets.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2MEL.label: Node MEL-2 "Bone Whip"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2MEL.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows crafting species to hatch new weapons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3MEL.label: Node MEL-3 "Sickle Claw"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3MEL.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows crafting species to hatch new weapons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5ESS.label: Node ESS-5 "Essence Extraction"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5ESS.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allow the Arachne swarm to build special living buildings, invest prisoners to produce essence, and at the same time build Arachne gene experimental eggs to develop special swarm technology.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8POD.label: Node POD-8 "Air Bag Species"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8POD.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the Zerg to build a special auxiliary insect that can airdrop items and Zerg to other places on the map without fuel.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1NPT.label: Node NPT-1 "Central Tower"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1NPT.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the Zerg to build a central nutrient supply facility that can automatically replenish nutrients to linked buildings that require nutrients.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5SHL.label: Node SHL-5 "Photooma"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5SHL.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the Zerg to build a special tumor that provides direct light for plant growth.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6SHL.label: Node SHL-6 "Temperature Control"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6SHL.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the Zerg to build a special stationary auxiliary that can control the temperature of a room.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1TUN.label: Node TUN-1 "tunnel species"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1TUN.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the Zerg to build a special fixed auxiliary insect that can connect two places by digging tunnels to quickly transport personnel and materials between the two places.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6GUT.label: Node GUT-6 "Catalysis"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6GUT.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the worms to use the catalytic ability of living bacteria, allowing the swarm to build a series of output buildings.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2NPT.label: Node NPT-2 "Sleep Cocoon"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2NPT.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the Zerg to build cocoons for storing excess Zerg. The Zerg inside will sleep until the Hive Mind calls again.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3NPT.label: Node NPT-3 "Honey Crystal Cake"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3NPT.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the Zerg to build a lair that produces Arachne honey crystal cake, and produces edible honey crystal cake by decomposing insect honey. This food processed in the nest can help the insect swarm resist the influence of cold-blooded animals, and its soft and chewy texture makes it enjoyable for non-zerg colonists.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8CPE.label: Node CPE-8 "Bacteria Cultivation"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8CPE.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the Zerg to grow a crop on the creep, which can grow on the nutrients of the creep and the land to provide the nest with activated bacteria.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9CPE.label: Node CPE-9 "Stinger Shooter"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9CPE.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the Zerg to grow a special crop on the carpet, which will grow into an aggressive fungus aggregate that shoots poisonous stingers at enemies.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6SPV.label: Node SPV-6 "auxiliary insect nest"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6SPV.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows crafting species to hatch new weapons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7SPV.label: Node SPV-7 "Explosive Projection"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7SPV.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the Zerg to build a powerful defense capable of projecting blaster auxiliaries focused on suicide attacks at invading enemies.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2MED.label: Node MED-2 "Erosion Parasitism"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2MED.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows honeypot species to use the ability of parasitoid species to parasitize, and unlocks the production of nemesis inhibitors in medical cocoons.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5STL.label: Node STL-5 "Gene Stealing"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5STL.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the warrior species to undergo directed evolution, abandoning its combat skills in exchange for its ability to extract and inject genes from colonists, prisoners, and slaves. All technologies in the Arachne swarm that require blueprints can only be researched through genetic test eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1VTE.label: Node VTE-1 "Guardian"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1VTE.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allow Shieldheads to undergo directed evolution, abandoning their ability to produce chitin and building buildings in exchange for combat capabilities, movement capabilities, and ramming attack skills. All technologies in the Arachne swarm that require blueprints can only be researched through genetic test eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1MED.label: Node MED-1 "Healing Seed"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1MED.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allow honeypot species to undergo directed evolution and abandon the ability to produce insect honey in order to strengthen their own medical capabilities and regularly produce medicines. All technologies in the Arachne swarm that require blueprints can only be researched through genetic test eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4CLO.label: Node CLO-4 "Hunter Species"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4CLO.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the warrior species to undergo directed evolution, sacrificing its ability to use ranged weapons in exchange for powerful melee combat and permanent invisibility. All technologies in the Arachne swarm that require blueprints can only be researched through genetic test eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1BAC.label: Node BAC-1 "Breeding Breed"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1BAC.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the mist species to undergo directed evolution, sacrificing its armor and ability to spray pheromones in exchange for the ability to produce the advanced resource "activated giant bacteria" required by the insect swarm. All technologies in the Arachne swarm that require blueprints can only be researched through genetic test eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9WID.label: Node WID-9 "Magnetic Storm"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9WID.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the directional evolution of aerial species, sacrificing the ability to maneuver at high speed and high altitude in exchange for the ability to project a large number of magnetic storm species at the enemy. This swarm can release EMP in a suicidal attack to fight against the mechanical race. All technologies in the Arachne swarm that require blueprints can only be researched through genetic test eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6LOD.label: Node LOD-6 "Lord of the Nest"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6LOD.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allow Sky Seeds to undergo directed evolution, sacrificing the ability to maneuver at high speeds and high altitudes in exchange for the ability to project a large number of Sky Nest Seeds at the enemy. This flying auxiliary insect is very fast and difficult to deal with in close combat. All technologies in the Arachne swarm that require blueprints can only be researched through genetic test eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3CON.label: Node CON-3 "Builder"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3CON.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allow shield-headed species to undergo directed evolution, abandoning their defensive capabilities in exchange for stronger chitin production capabilities and the ability to build buildings. All technologies in the Arachne swarm that require blueprints can only be researched through genetic test eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8FEL.label: Node FEL-8 "deflagration chamber"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8FEL.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allow honeypot species to undergo directed evolution, abandoning the ability to produce insect honey in order to gain the ability to increase defense, produce chemical fuel, and shoot fire. All technologies in the Arachne swarm that require blueprints can only be researched through genetic test eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3CRP.label: Node CRP-3 "Certificate Laying"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3CRP.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allow mist species to undergo directed evolution, abandoning the ability to spray pheromones in order to gain increased defense, movement speed, and the ability to lay large-scale creeps. All technologies in the Arachne swarm that require blueprints can only be researched through genetic test eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9NAV.label: Node NAV-9 "Navigator"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9NAV.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the Guard species to undergo directed evolution, abandoning direct combat capabilities and the ability to command ground insect swarms in exchange for the ability to command aerial insect swarms. All technologies in the Arachne swarm that require blueprints can only be researched through genetic test eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1EVO.label: Node EVO-1 "Primary Evolution"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_1EVO.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the implementation of the new Arachne evolution surgery, allowing the Arachne zerg to gain greater nutrient storage capacity and a thicker carapace.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3EVO.label: Node EVO-3 "Gliding Wing Membrane"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_3EVO.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the implementation of the new Arachne evolution surgery, which allows the Arachne Zerg to implant gliding wing membranes on its legs to gain higher movement speed on creep.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4EVO.label: Node EVO-4 "Exploding Pod"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4EVO.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the implementation of the new Arachne evolution surgery, allowing Arachne zerg to use molt pods to hatch blasters capable of launching suicide attacks.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5EVO.label: Node EVO-5 "Reactive Carapace"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_5EVO.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the implementation of the new Arachne evolution surgery, allowing the Arachne Zerg to implant a reactive carapace that can withstand any amount of damage at a time.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6EVO.label: Node EVO-6 "Strengthening tendons"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_6EVO.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the new Arachne evolution surgery, allowing the Arachne Zerg to implant tendons that support the ability to jump.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7EVO.label: Node EVO-7 "Carapace Thorn"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_7EVO.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the implementation of the new Arachne evolution surgery, which allows Arachne Zerg to implant spiny tubes that automatically attack nearby enemies.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8EVO.label: Node EVO-8 "GRP Shell"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8EVO.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the implementation of the new Arachne evolution surgery, allowing the Arachne Zerg to implant fiberglass into the carapace to obtain strong defense.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9EVO.label: Node EVO-9 "Physiological Suppression"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_9EVO.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the implementation of the new Arachne evolution surgery, allowing the Arachne Zerg to get rid of the lifespan limit at the cost of losing its self-healing ability.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_10EVO.label: Node EVO-10 "Advanced Lung"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_10EVO.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the new Arachne evolution surgery, giving the Arachne zerg more powerful lungs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2SYM.label: Node SYM-2 "Frost Formation"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_2SYM.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the Arachne Zerg to build a special living structure - the Arachne Symbiosis Muscle Group, an unconscious tissue that can be fused with the Overlord Bug, providing powerful combat effectiveness to the Overlord Bug. The frost-bound symbiotic muscle group can support the Arachnidok fused with it to use a variety of freezing weapons, and can switch between controlling large-scale crowds and quickly killing high-value targets.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8SLA.label: Node SLA-8 "Beast of Slaughter"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_8SLA.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the queen species to hatch new beasts and insects - the violent slaughter species. All technologies in the Arachne swarm that require blueprints can only be researched through genetic test eggs.
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4COV.label: Node COV-4 "Sky Witch Herd"
LanguageData.ARA_Technology_4COV.description: Arachne Swarm - Main Hive Tentacles The evolutionary path of the Main Hive Tentacles is a common evolutionary path included in every swarm. They establish the biological superiority of the swarm. Allows the Arachne Zerg to build a special living structure - the Sky Witch Beast Bug, a semi-autonomous individual commanded by the Pilot Species, which can flexibly attack the enemy from the sky according to instructions to rain death.
